## Data Source {.smaller}

**Appalachian Play Fairway Analysis Seismic Hazards Supporting Data**([Link](https://data.world/us-doe-gov/e8fc308b-97df-460e-bdc6-cce8eb82e943))

-   A dataset that focus on a set of earthquake events within the Appalachian area
-   Standard information on the earthquake event
    -   location (`latitude` and `longitude`, location name)
    -   `magnitude`, `depth` and `time`
-   Additional information
    -   magnitude types
    -   blast potential, `contributor` (data source)

**Reference:** Cornell University. (2016). Appalachian Basin Play Fairway Analysis Thermal Risk Factor and Quality Analyses \[data set\]. Retrieved from https://dx.doi.org/10.15121/1495426.
